validation.validation: Program of Study must have an Effective Dated row with a prior In Progress Status.
To specify a program of study as primary, ensure that it belongs in a category that can stand alone as the student's only educational objective.
Expected Completion Date for the same Program of Study must be the same.
Must enter a valid Student Program of Study Record Status.
Expected Completion Date cannot be edited for existing Program of Study Record.
Expected Completion Date must be entered for the new Program of Study.
The Program of Study status reason is not eligible for the selected criteria
You can specify a Date of Determination only for programs with a status of Institutional Withdrawal or Leave of Absence.
Program of Study must have a complete status if the previous status for the program was complete.
An inactive program cannot be primary when there is another active program for the snapshot.
To bundle programs of study, ensure that the student has the program to bundle with.
You can bundle only programs that cannot stand alone as the student’s only educational objective with programs that can.
When a program of study has a parent program of study, you can only bundle it with its parent program.
You cannot bundle an advisory program of study with another program.
Add at least 1 program focus that is required for this program of study and bundle it with this program.
Ensure that the status of the program of study you are bundling with matches that of this program.
You can bundle only programs that cannot stand alone as the student’s only educational objective with programs that can.
Effective Dated row after Program of Study with Matriculated Status must have a Matriculated, In Progress, Discontinued, or Leave of Absence Status.
Specify an Effective Date that's on or before today for the first snapshot with a Complete status for the student.
For the student's first snapshot with a Matriculated status, specify an Effective Date that's on or before today.
Specify programs of study that are associated with the same institution.

Import_Student_Program_of_Study_Assignme.description: Program of Study Assignment Snapshot Data

validation.validation: This row must contain all of the Programs of Study from all of the previous rows.
Cannot have duplicate Programs of Study in a row.
One Primary Program of Study must be selected for the Effective Dated row.
Must have unique Order for each Effective Dated row.
Only the first Effective Dated row may contain Matriculated Statuses.
The first Effective Dated row must contain only Matriculated Statuses.
Effective Dated rows must be ordered by Effective Date.
Enter an Effective Date of [start date of current period] or [start date of next period].
You must pick an effective date that is after current or future Academic Periods with registrations to change to a primary Program of Study on a different Academic Calendar.
Not all programs can be inactive if there are in progress registrations for the student.
Cannot change primary program while completing new programs in a snapshot.
Ensure that the Primary Program of Study has a calendar policy that is effective as of the effective date of the snapshot.

validation.validation: Programs with the same educational credential that are completing together need to have the same honor or award and award date.
The honor or award is being specified for the educational credential on the conferral data more than once.
The educational credential specified for the honor or award must be valid for the program.
Programs of Study conferring together must have the same conferral Academic Period.
Programs of Study conferring together must have the same conferral date.

description: Import Student Program of Study Assignment Snapshot Data

validation.validation: Academic Record Reference must be for the Student Reference.
Student has more than one Academic Record. Please submit Academic Record Reference.
Submit either Student Reference or Academic Record Reference.
There is an In Progress or Revised Edit Program of Study for Student Event for this Academic Record.
Programs specified for Conferral Data must have a snapshot with a complete status.
A conferral Academic Period must be specified for the Program of Study that is being completed.
A conferral date must be specified for the Program of Study that is being completed.
The specified student has been merged with another student record. Specify the merged student instead.
